tool_description: The AI-powered API effortlessly removes backgrounds.
name: Image Background Removal
title: Image Background Removal

api_list.name: Remove image background
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts an image as input and provides a response containing the corresponding mask.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://image-background-removal4.p.rapidapi.com/process_image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-background-removal4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://image-background-removal4.p.rapidapi.com/process_image"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
